Content: I’m considering adding a cruiser to my stable and taking a hard look at an HD Heritage. Seems to fill that cruiser, longer distance need in a lighter package with a more nimble feel. Eager to get anyone’s thoughts out there who owns or has owned one to get a user-grade opinion. This would be my first Harley as well.
